fontDefinition.label: SQL Editor Text font
fontDefinition.description: SQL Editor Text font is used by SQL Editor.

fontDefinition.label: Data Grid Text font
fontDefinition.description: Data Grid Text font is used by both Data Grid and Execution Plan of SQL Editor.

fontDefinition.label: Line Number Text font
fontDefinition.description: Line Number Text font is used by current line number of SQL Editor.

fontDefinition.label: Viewer font
fontDefinition.description: Viewer Text font is used by Schema Browser, Session Manager and Parameter Manager.

fontDefinition.label: Dialog font
fontDefinition.description: Dialog font is the fonts for widgets in dialogs.

command.description: Clear DBMS Output Winow before Query
